config.kleeslabs.title: KleeSlabs
config.kleeslabs.mode.tooltip: Control whether KleeSlabs should trigger ALWAYS, ONLY_WHEN_SNEAKING or ONLY_WHEN_NOT_SNEAKING
config.kleeslabs.disabledCompat.tooltip: IDs of mods whose compatibility should be disabled.
config.kleeslabs.dumpSlabs.tooltip: For development purposes. Set to true to have KleeSlabs dump a list of items containing the word 'slab' in their name upon world load.
